body: you shouldnt take hentai too seriously
doesnt need to be lust specifically.It can be a cope up.As an ex. a big size of rape victims  undergo orgasms .It doesnt mean  they get attached to  it

Normally Love >>> Lust, However short-term situations can change that. I.e Long Distant Relationships, Sexual Frustration, Drunkenness even peer pressure. Mostly when you're in a mental state where you're unable to make a decision, and that mistake can just keep escalating if you try to hide it because said mistake breaks the relationship. Although hentai is too short to show that though.

I still never understand lust > love, especially in manga or in real life. 
Ehhh whatev
